* SSH公钥

  ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "自己邮箱@fangdd.com

* Clone with hooks

  git clone ssh://panfeilong-sz@gerrit.fangdd.cn:29418/fangdd/infr/TradeCenter2.0 && scp -p -P 29418 panfeilong-sz@gerrit.fangdd.cn:hooks/commit-msg TradeCenter2.0/.git/hooks/

* push to master

  git push origin master:refs/for/master
